abstract: BitTorrent, the peer-to-peer content distributor, has raised a $17 million third round from previous investors DCM and Accel Partners, as well as DAG Ventures, according to peHUB.
lead_paragraph: BitTorrent, the peer-to-peer content distributor, has raised a $17 million third round from previous investors DCM and Accel Partners, as well as DAG Ventures, according to peHUB.

headline.main: BitTorrent Said to Get More Funding
